trans-unit.resname: RAPMIS solution supports both the administration of the establishment than the parent in better monitoring and supervision of the student so that all efforts to make it a good product for society are achieved.

trans-unit.resname: Dear Parents, If this solution is not yet used in the school where your child's school, enter us and we will get closer to the administration of the establishment so that he appropriates it for the benefit of everyone and particularly you the parent.

trans-unit.resname: Dear heads of nursery, primary, secondary, university and other establishments training centers, this monitoring solution will allow you to have all the information about each of your students without the need to go through a third party. Thanks to RAPMIS, the student's file will be at your fingertips and you will be able, thanks to the amount of information gathered, make direct statistics, carry out an action on the basis of convincing and concrete elements, guide a new policy thanks to the amount of information available, to provide reliable information to parents and other guardian (s) when needed.
trans-unit.source: Dear heads of nursery, primary, secondary, university and other establishments training centers, this monitoring solution will allow you to have all the information about each of your students without the need to go through a third party. Thanks to RAPMIS, the student's file will be at your fingertips and you will be able, thanks to the amount of information gathered, make direct statistics, carry out an action on the basis of convincing and concrete elements, guide a new policy thanks to the amount of information available, to provide reliable information to parents and other guardian (s) when needed.
trans-unit.target: Chers chefs d'établissements maternels et primaires, secondaires, universitaires, et autres centres de formation, cette solution de monitoring vous permettra en un clic d'avoir toutes les informations sur chacun de vos élèves sans nécessité de passer par un tiers. Grâce à RAPMIS, le dossier de l'élève sera à votre portée et vous pourrez, grâce à la somme d'informations recoltées, faire des statistiques directes, mener une action sur la base d'éléments probants et concrets, orienter une nouvelle politique grâce à la somme d'informations disponibles , donner des informations fiables aux parents et autres tuteurs en cas de besoin. .

trans-unit.resname: Dear students, Please get enough sleep, Olympic form ensures better academic performance
trans-unit.source: Dear students, Please get enough sleep, Olympic form ensures better academic performance
trans-unit.target: Cher élèves, Veuillez dormir suffisamment ,Une forme olympique nous assures un meilleur rendement intellectuel.

trans-unit.resname: Don't get stuck on a bad school result, a mistake is an opportunity to learn
trans-unit.source: Don't get stuck on a bad school result, a mistake is an opportunity to learn
trans-unit.target: Ne bloques pas sur mauvais résultat, Une erreur est l'occasion d'apprendre

trans-unit.resname: At the beginning of each year, identify common mistakes and threatening subjects from the past year .
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each year, identify common mistakes and threatening subjects from the past year .
trans-unit.target: Au début de chaque année, Identifiez les erreurs et les matieres menaçantes de l'année précédente .

trans-unit.resname: We must prioritize dialogue with our loved ones. They are the most likely to inform us when we get lost.
trans-unit.source: We must prioritize dialogue with our loved ones. They are the most likely to inform us when we get lost.
trans-unit.target: Privélégions le dialogue avec nos proches. Ils sont les plus susceptibles de nous informer quand on s'égare

trans-unit.resname: It's important to ask for help, but don't fall into the trap of letting others do your homework and homework.
trans-unit.source: It's important to ask for help, but don't fall into the trap of letting others do your homework and homework.
trans-unit.target: Il est important de demander des conseils, mais ne tombez pas dans le piège de laisser faire vos devoirs et vos travaux par d'autres.

trans-unit.resname: Learn to imagine and find solutions.
trans-unit.source: Learn to imagine and find solutions.
trans-unit.target: Apprenez à imaginer et à trouver des solutions

trans-unit.resname: Finding your own pace of work is fundamental for a learner.
trans-unit.source: Finding your own pace of work is fundamental for a learner.
trans-unit.target: Trouver son propre rythme de travail est fondamental pour un apprenant

trans-unit.resname: Your success depends at least as much on your attitude as on your skills.
trans-unit.source: Your success depends at least as much on your attitude as on your skills.
trans-unit.target: Votre réussite dépend au moins autant de votre attitude que de vos aptitudes.

trans-unit.resname: Do You want to be a doctor? Read biology
trans-unit.source: Do You want to be a doctor? Read biology
trans-unit.target: Veux tu devenir docteur? Bûches la biologie

trans-unit.resname: You want to become a reporter? Review your language.
trans-unit.source: You want to become a reporter? Review your language.
trans-unit.target: Tu veux devenir Journaliste? Revises tes langues.

trans-unit.resname: You want to become an astronaut? Do not mess with Physic,
trans-unit.source: You want to become an astronaut? Do not mess with Physic,
trans-unit.target: Veux-tu devenir Astronaute? Ne plaisantes avec les sciences Physiques,

trans-unit.resname: Do you want to become scientist? Do not give up,Einstein
trans-unit.source: Do you want to become scientist? Do not give up,Einstein
trans-unit.target: Veux tu être scientifique? N'abandonnes pas Einstein.

trans-unit.resname: Get fifteen out of twenty in dictation
trans-unit.source: Get fifteen out of twenty in dictation
trans-unit.target: Obtenir quinze sur vingt en dictée

trans-unit.resname: Understand the equations in one week.
trans-unit.source: Understand the equations in one week.
trans-unit.target: Comprendre les équations en une semaine

trans-unit.resname: Do not forget that : You are the Boss.
trans-unit.source: Do not forget that : You are the Boss.
trans-unit.target: N'oubliez pas : c'est vous le chef.

trans-unit.resname: Dear Parents, If this solution is not yet used in the school where your child's school, enter us and we will get closer to the administration of the establishment so that he appropriates it for the benefit of everyone and particularly you the parent.

trans-unit.target: Chers parents, Si cette solution n'est pas encore utilisée dans l'école où va votre enfant, saisissez nous et nous nous rapprocherons de l'administration de l'établissement pour qu'il se l'approprie dans l'intérêt de tous et en particulier de vous le parent.

trans-unit.resname: Provide a solution that take into account the occupations and educational level of parents
trans-unit.source: Provide a solution that take into account the occupations and educational level of parents
trans-unit.target: Offrir une solution qui tienne compte des occupations et du niveau d’instruction des parents

trans-unit.resname: Possibility for the parent, the guardian, or the student himself to consult for all the information
trans-unit.source: Possibility for the parent, the guardian, or the student himself to consult for all the information
trans-unit.target: Possibilité pour le parent, le tuteur ou l'élève lui-même de consulter pour avoir toutes les informations.

trans-unit.resname: Section reserved for advice, useful websites, civic instruction, etc ... that students can consult for free
trans-unit.source: Section reserved for advice, useful websites, civic instruction, etc ... that students can consult for free
trans-unit.target: Section réservée pour les avis, les liens utiles, l'instruction civique, etc... accessible gratuitement
Vous êtes connecté(e) en tant que

trans-unit.resname: Covid-19 is a reality. Protect ourselves.
trans-unit.source: Covid-19 is a reality. Protect ourselves.

trans-unit.resname: To protect your health and the health of others, it is essential to follow the preventive health instructions: compulsory wearing of a mask, limitation of contact and movement to what is strictly necessary, frequent hand washing, no handshakes or hugs
trans-unit.source: To protect your health and the health of others, it is essential to follow the preventive health instructions: compulsory wearing of a mask, limitation of contact and movement to what is strictly necessary, frequent hand washing, no handshakes or hugs
trans-unit.target: Pour protéger notre santé et celle des autres, il est indispensable de suivre les consignes sanitaires de prévention : port obligatoire du masque, limitation des contacts et déplacements au strict nécessaire, lavage fréquent des mains, pas de poignées de mains ou d’embrassades.

trans-unit.resname: If you have symptoms suggestive of COVID-19 (cough, fever, sore throat), you must report to the administration without delay.
trans-unit.source: If you have symptoms suggestive of COVID-19 (cough, fever, sore throat), you must report to the administration without delay.
trans-unit.target: Si vous avez des symptômes évocateurs du COVID-19 (toux, fièvre, mal de gorge), il faut vous signaler sans tarder à l'administration.
